Properties.Description:
Visit the Squads tab to evolve a Survivor of your choice. Evolved Survivors will increase your Homebase power.

Note: You must unlock the required skill tree node before this Quest can be completed.

To evolve a Survivor:
Select Squads
Select Survivor Squads
Select Go to All Survivors
Select a Survivor
Select Upgrade/Inspect
Select View Evolution
Select Evolve
